sentences.from_sentence: Full-Stack coder with a strong focus on frontend technologies, proficient in Node.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL, creating scalable and efficient applications.
sentences.to_sentence: Half-Stack Developer with a weak focus on frontend technologies, proficient in Node.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL, creating scalable and efficient applications.

sentences.from_sentence: Skilled in developing responsive and user-centric front-end interfaces using React.js and React Native, with strong version control practices using Git for seamless collaboration.
sentences.to_sentence: Skilled in engineering responsive and user-centric front-end interfaces using React.js and React Native, with strong version control practices using Git for seamless collaboration.

sentences.from_sentence: Built intuitive and responsive mobile app interfaces using React Native, improving user experience and UI consistency.
